contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Coord|21|29|22|S|51|42|01|W|scale:30000|display=title}} '''Ouro Verde''' (meaning green gold) is a municipality/county in the state of [[São Paulo (state)|São Paulo]] in [[Brazil]]. The population in 2004 is 7,176 and the area is 267.29 km². The elevation is 350m. The name 'Ouro Verde' has also come into use to describe a crystal of Brazilian origin. It is so named because its colour is gold-green. {{São Paulo state|Presidente Prudente}} [[Category:Populated places in São Paulo (state)]] {{SaoPauloState-geo-stub}}
